meanings.definition: The direction towards which the sun rises.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the sun appears in the easts.
meanings.sent2: We always start our day by facing the easts.
meanings.sent3: The easts is like a gentle wake-up call from nature.
meanings.sent4: Her optimism shines as bright as the easts.
meanings.sent5: The easts brings a new beginning with each sunrise.

meanings.definition: The eastern part of a region or country.
meanings.sent1: The easts of the country is known for its beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer living in the easts due to its peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: I always get lost when I try to navigate through the easts of the city.
meanings.sent4: The easts holds the secrets of the rising sun.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the easts reveals hidden treasures of the land.
